alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Dickey; Emmons; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 12:17AM CST until February 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Burleigh, Sioux, Emmons, Logan, McIntosh, and Dickey Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ this morning to Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow and widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility making travel hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous wind chills could return Tuesday night, and likely remain through the end of the week.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Burleigh; Dickey; Emmons; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Sioux
